item.dc:creator: @jason_x jason_x
item.description:
@jason_x wrote:

im done with this place i honestly want it to end people like you make my life worse than its people judge what they dont know so i guess thats great and i never said i was emo i am me i just seem emo yeah and im not a cool kid if i didnt feel like killing myself right now id probably punch you but i dont fuck the world im done!

killerman93:

Mental breakdowns dont turn you emo, those are emotional breakdowns.

And honestly, real emo’s (like STH) never admit that they are emo. Jason_x is definitely in it for the cool factor associated with emos (which is basically nonexistant) or for the chicks.

item.title: EMOS! like them or not?
item.dc:creator: @jason_x jason_x
item.description:
@jason_x wrote:

I just lov ehow people think they can talk about this subject when they have no idea how it feels.
I doubt half the people know that emo i snot a trend.
I have to hide how depressed I am my mom doesnt even know i had a breakdown i was at my dads at the time people those guys you see with the bright close and stuff thats not emo thats scene.
So when someone else knows how I feel ill talk to them.
But not to be hypecritical of myself but guys stereotypes suck.

Read full topic

voodoo is part of believing in satan.

no, it is not. it is a part of a religion that was made in hate of the christian church that say they’re satanists, but really just make our religion look worse.

item.title: EMOS! like them or not?
item.dc:creator: @jason_x jason_x
item.description:
@jason_x wrote:

Ok fuck you exe. me and her are friends and you think you are so badass ebcause you can insult me on the internet you have some nerver and it pisses me off.
Even when im down i get yelled at by people like you and i have fucking had it banned or not this community is getting worse and worse and your just another stereo typer who thinks all this about someone you have never met in your life dont even post another post in this thread because its just gonna be to drag me down farther than I am you have no idea what emo punk or anything is because your head is too far up your ass.
When you insult me normally it would just hurt but ive just had so much shit this week that i am just gonna lay it all on you in anger because it is something I havent had experience in a long time and since I am going to be a rapist and I am obsessed with someone I do not know.
Get your damn facts straight and just leave me the hell alone.

Read full topic

item.title: EMOS! like them or not?
item.dc:creator: @exe626 exe626
item.description:
@exe626 wrote:

Enjoy, she doesn’t like him nor does she wish to be around him. He’s obsessed with somebody that doesn’t even know him. He’ll probably grow up to be a rapist.

item.title: EMOS! like them or not?
item.dc:creator: @Enjoy_me_now Enjoy me now
item.description:
@Enjoy_me_now wrote:

[quote=“jason_x, post:157, topic:125650”][quote author=dragonus18 link=topic=175863.msg1828560#msg1828560 date=1192689755]

You know your right im not exactly your deffinition of emo.

F@C#

I fit under the categories punk/skater/emo/outcast

but you have the freaking audacity to call me what I am not just because the way I post.
Gothic people worship satan…I am an Atheist.
second I really do not want to fight over the internet I am who I am I am not emo I am me im not scene im not goth but whatever thats all it is nowadays is freaking labels.
I know that will never change and you already have you mindset on who I am well let’s stop here I do not want to have a fight on the internet it is not worth it let’s start this over and forget about it. I come on the internet to talk to my friends. and whether or not you believe me the girl I Loved moved away and broke my heart, and I had a mental breakdown. To make things worse she moved back, and now my best friend is hitting on her and it just hurts me so much everyday just to see her face when I get home I lose it.

Is that enough of my personal life for you?

i would just like to point out, that goth’s don’t worship satan, they are into voodoo and that shit,
[/quote]
I stereotype you I know but reall could care less now none wants to believe how worthless i am so because i believe i shouldnt exist im gothic because I fell in love and had an emotional breakdown because she broke my heart i am obsessed i cant take this stress!![/quote]

voodoo is part of believing in satan. and get over it go break her heart or something itl make you feel better

Read full topic

Go to a counselor. Not a Therapist, they rape people.

jason_x:

None of them listen to me they pretend but really dont. The last one I went to didnt even give me a diagnosis so I do not really trust them but we are getting way off topic here and I do not feel like getting yelled at.

Stop insulting our intelligence with this bullshit. Give me the name and number of the counselor/therapist you visited.

item.title: EMOS! like them or not?
item.dc:creator: @exe626 exe626
item.description:
@exe626 wrote:

That isn’t emo. They think emo is a style. Emo is a way of life and nothing else, get that through your damn heads. But, in all honesty, if you ever see a real emo, they DON’T wear all black, no fucking pink(those are punks), usually some kind of weird mix. Which(in my eyes) is fucking awesome looking.
